publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6039 Jackie Baillie: Congratulations to the Good Life: Positive Attitudes Group—That the Parliament congratulates the Good Life: Positive Attitudes Group in West Dunbartonshire for being awarded the Chairman’s Award at the 2010 COSLA awards; understands that the group, which was set up in 2003, is made up of adults with learning disabilities; further understands that the group aims to improve the lives of individuals with learning disabilities who face significant barriers in accessing public services; is aware that the group currently provides unique training, based on group members’ own personal experience, for organisations that deliver public services; considers this to be an innovative and worthy training forum that has been used by a number of organisations across Scotland; recognises the positive and lasting contribution that the Good Life: Positive Attitudes Group has had on the lives of people living with a learning disability; congratulates all those involved, and supports the continued development of this valuable service.

S3M-6039 Congratulations to the Good Life: Positive Attitudes Group (lodged on 23 March 2010) Hugh Henry*, Kenneth Gibson*, Mary Mulligan*, Sandra White*, Ken Macintosh*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Bill Kidd*, Des McNulty*
S3M-6039 Congratulations to the Good Life: Positive Attitudes Group (lodged on 23 March 2010) James Kelly*, Trish Godman*, Patricia Ferguson*
